input_text:
Job Title: Job Opening for "Technical Lead- Data Engineering" #Fulltime Role# Boston, MA Local Candidates Only

Location: Boston, MA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, MST Solutions, is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!

If you are interested, Please share your updated resume here,

Role: Technical Lead

Location: Boston, MA

Duration: Fulltime

As a Technical Lead , you'll lead the design and development of database solutions leveraging cloud tools and technologies. This includes modeling and prototyping database designs, ownership of database scripts, legacy data analysis, and Azure Data Factory data pipelines solution. You will also work closely with the Principal, Cloud, and Platform Architects, as well as the Technical Delivery Lead. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and optimizing stored procedures within the Snowflake cloud data platform. Your expertise will contribute to the efficiency and performance of our data processing and analysis workflows.

The Expertise You'll Bring:

Bachelor s or master s degree in a technology-related field (e.g., Engineering, Computer Science, etc.) required6+ years of experience in designing and developing data warehouse and data lake ETL/ELT pipelines,4+ years building Enterprise Data Warehouse (EDW) from multiple sources,4+ years of experience with Cloud technologies (AWS / Azure / Snowflake)4+ years of experience with data transformation tools and services. (Azure Data Factory,)4+ years of SQL scripting experience and excellent understanding of SQL joins, ranks, nested queries, complex CDC logic, etc.Experience with DevOps, CI/CD pipeline technologies (GitHub, etc.)Understanding of Agile methodologies (Scrum and Kanban)

The Skills You Bring

Experience leading a team of developers with multiple skills,Experience writing technical design documents, and documenting implementation plans,Advanced SQL knowledgeAbility to perform data analysis on legacy systems such as Teradata, SQL Server, MongoDB, Oracle, etc.Pulling data into Snowflake using ETL/ELT data integration patterns Expertise in data modeling concepts such as dimensional modeling, slow-changing- dimension (SCD) types, Data Vault modeling, Normalized/Denormalized architectures, etc.Strong Interpersonal skills in teamwork, facilitation, communication, and negotiation.Excellent written and verbal communication skills, especially within the IT community.Excellent planning and organizational skills.

Requirements:

ADF data pipelines (ETL/ELT)SQLSnowflakeData Modeling

Thanks & Regards,

Gowthami Paramasivam

Senior Talent Acquisition Specialist

Mobile:

Email:

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
